codicia, avaricia, afán (< Lat. {{sm|cupiditia}}; < Lat. {{sm|avaritia}}; probably < Lat. {{sm|afannae}})

raro, extraño, peculiar (< Lat. {{sm|rarus}}; < Lat. {{sm|extrāneus}}; < Lat. {{sm|peculiāris}})
